content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map. The agent made multiple attempts to supply a Lab at (0.5, 2.5)—a structure intended for research via Automation Science Packs—but none of these attempts succeeded due to inventory shortages and crafting resource issues. Although existing furnaces (an alternative furnace at (5.0, 5.0) used for iron smelting and a copper furnace at (–27.0, –60.0) used for copper plate production) were identified and utilized, they were not newly created by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
• API usage errors with get_entities:
 – Avoid passing unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or using incorrect positional arguments.
 – Always check the function signature and validate its return value (handle cases where it may return None before iterating).

• Lab placement and crafting issues:
 – Confirm that the required Lab item is present in inventory before attempting placement.
 – Validate that any list of returned entities (e.g. labs) is not None before iterating to filter or process them.

• Resource prerequisites for Lab crafting:
 – Ensure all sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available before initiating Lab crafting.
 – Synchronize resource production—such as smelting iron or copper—to meet both direct and intermediate requirements, thereby avoiding shortages during crafting attempts.
